transcript.text: a shabbat shalom Gary and I had just
finished preaching here and one thing
that I've noticed is that both times
that we've come here there have been
weddings and what I feel like yah is
saying is that he's sending out the
wedding invitations but a lot of people
don't don't respond and he has a parable
about this where he says he's he's he's
inviting everyone to the wedding and he
goes out to his people and he sends out
the invitations and no one knowing they
say oh and I got to do this I got to do
that I got to do this and then he he
sends it out to others and they respond
so we've come here twice now and and
some respond most don't but that's how
it is where the last days and also I
just want to say that in our weakness
he's made strong you know Jerry was he
was very very sick and he came out here
and yah strengthened his voice and he
was actually preaching longer than I did
and so that's a current to me and that
should be encouragement to you guys to
go out and preach and to proclaim his
word hallelujah shabbat shalom this is
daniel john lee with tour restoration
ministries I mean
